tool_description: Decomposes time series data into trend, seasonal, and residual components for improved demand and supply forecasting accuracy.

seasonality_period.description: Seasonality period in time steps (24 for daily, 168 for weekly)

error_messages: Insufficient data: Need minimum 168 data points (one week) for decomposition.
Invalid seasonality period: Must be positive integer less than half the data length.
Invalid decomposition method: Use additive or multiplicative.
Data quality issues: Time series contains too many missing or invalid values.
usage: Provide time_series_data array. Optionally specify seasonality_period and decomposition_method. Returns decomposed trend, seasonal, and residual components.
